name: DIRECTUS
description:
DIRECTUS is a cooperative game where the goal is for three of the players to arrive in the same room at the end of the game. They are helped by a fourth player who has all the information about the building and can guide them only by sending emoticons.

Made by Full Monkey Studio :
Alcide FRIOT

Aymeric LE MOAL : https://itch.io/profile/salyel

Mathieu WAY

Mathieu ARQUILLIÈRE

Valentin ROCHE

Ophélie FOUCAULT : https://orpher.itch.io/

Catherine LARIVIERE

Lucas FILLEUL
